title: Not getting Worlds 2017 missions
body:
It's been at least 2 days since I've completed all but one of the missions I got from the event, however the one I'm missing is the "Complete Four Missions" mission, which I have 3/4 complete but I have no other missions to do.

I already have an idea of why I have the problem: I completed one mission at a time where there was an alert where missions weren't registering properly or something, and I never got the reward for it (Of course, I only noticed the problem after I completed one missions). I think that mission not having been counted is what's got me stuck on the "Complete four missions" one. I'd love if a rioter could free me from this limbo.

replies.body: I did go ahead and check your mission progress and everything seems to be lining up. You'll need to wait for the new missions to come later this week.
Hm, interesting. Well, thanks for checking it out. I'll also echo the question Silver Bullet asked though.

I believe that'll be Thursday!

EDIT: Finally got some hard-concrete info for ya boys! Looks like the next set of missions will appear on Oct 2. We hadn't been given this info until just now, sorry about the confusion!!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xgRugnoc,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-09-27T23:58:43.183+0000)
>
> I believe that'll be Thursday!

It's Thursday, no new events. What is the deal here, could you clarify what is going on?

We hadn't been given the hard dates for these missions until just recently (despite these poros best efforts, sometimes we just don't have all the info yet). The second set of Worlds Missions will be starting on Oct 2 from the info I was given!

Sorry again for all the confusion fam, we do our best to get you all the info as soon as we have it!
good to know I wasnt the only one that was confused  :D
Hey, can you please do me a favor and check whats going on with my quests, i only have 35 tokens and my next quest has to do with scoring 34 points with pickems, my ign is mcgeneralhd, thanks

Broporo, I appreciate you trying your best. I'll assume it's not your fault.

But those of us who bought the missions did so a week ago, and the flair for this event came up about the same time with a lot of ambiguous impressions of how the event would fold out. 

I won't blame you. But they really should've posted the schedule simultaneously with the selling of/ presenting the missions to avoid the sense we were being duped over a cash-grab. Just a suggestion for future events.
its not good eneough

I have no mission progresss at all =.[
5 missions on the slate.

> [{quoted}](name=ThisDique,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xgRugnoc,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2017-09-29T19:40:55.276+0000)
>
> I have no mission progresss at all =.[
> 5 missions on the slate.

Make sure you are equipping a world championship icon, otherwise you cannot finish them.
Hello I am also having the same problem can you fix this for me also please?
They weren't set to pop up as soon as the clock hit midnight Oct 2. If you don't have them *AFTER* Oct 2, then there might be a problem.
which day of the week are missions refreshed?
the next set come out on october 2nd
It's october 2nd and I still don't have any new missions. I payed for the worlds pass i'd like to get those missions -__-
I have not received the second set of worlds missions and am only 1/4 on the "Complete four more Worlds missions" quest. While my brother and everyone else i have talked to has received them.
I'm having the same issue :c
same
Same here pal. this sucks.
Ok then something is wrong with my quests as im only 1/4 on the only quest i have... 35 tokens too.
the next set of missions come out on october 2nd
same
Y have the same problem. Did you fix it?

I have a slightly different problem: my missions often won't load. I will open the missions tab and it is empty. I can't even find my past missions or missions I know I'm working on and haven't completed. I feel like its a connection issue rather than a loss of user data because I always have trouble logging into the sever even with stable wifi.
I'm having the same problem. I'd really like to be able to complete some of the other quests and get some of those sweet, sweet tokens
same with me
It's the same for everyone. I think new missions are sent out at the beginning of every week during Worlds.

So I think this is another way for rito to get more cash...cause you can get missions with RP. After making a spot in LCS 14 million euro and regulating something that is not theirs ...the gaming community. It was normal that your skill could decide who plays for the best....not cash....but this is real world... I wish people would riot against riot!
I have had the missions for 2 weeks and haven't gotten a single token nor completed a single mission. I get No progress completed at all for anything and I've got 5 missions now.
same here on EUW still 3/4 "complete four missions" no more quests are up since i thougt its weekly!

I'm in the same boat I completed the missions last week, not even sure that i received the vip missions after I bought them, and no missions this new week?  I'm confused,  I don't want to be missing out.   also stuck on the 3/4.

I think the lack of clarity on mission updates being slightly different from previous events is a little disappointing. 
Maybe it's just me, but I completed them in 2 hours after spending RP on a World's Pass. I've been gone for a few days and was excited to definitely have some missions to look forward to but still, nothing.
Also, you don't get your VIP missions.. Which should be there if you bought the worlds pass
I have the same problem but I only completed 2 missions and my friends completed much more? I didn’t get a bunch of missions from this week, sorry I might just be confused, thanks
